mapper.insert: insert into comment (board_idx, content, user_id) values (#{board_idx}, #{content}, #{user_id})
mapper.select: select * from comment where board_idx=#{board_idx} order by idx desc
mapper.update: update comment set content=#{content} where idx=#{idx} and user_id=#{user_id}
mapper.delete: delete from comment where idx=#{idx} and user_id=#{user_id}
